meanings.english: used when referring to someone or something for the first time in a text or conversation

examples.en: I saw a cat in the garden.

meanings.english: on the subject of; concerning

examples.en: Let's talk about your future plans.
examples.ko: 당신의 미래 계획에 대해 이야기해 봅시다.

meanings.english: at a higher level or layer than

examples.en: The sun is above the clouds.

meanings.english: from one side to the other side

examples.en: She walked across the street to the park.

meanings.english: take action; do something

examples.en: He decided to act on the new information.
examples.ko: 그는 새로운 정보에 대해 행동하기로 결정했다.

meanings.english: To combine numbers to find their total

examples.en: I need to add 5 and 3 to get 8.

meanings.english: The location where someone lives or a place where something is located

examples.en: Can you tell me your address?

meanings.english: A person who is fully grown and mature

examples.en: In most countries, you are considered an adult when you turn 18.

meanings.english: Feeling fear or anxiety about something

examples.en: I'm afraid of spiders.

meanings.english: Following in time or place

examples.en: We can go for a walk after dinner.
examples.ko: 저녁 식사 후에 산책을 갈 수 있어.

meanings.english: the time from noon or lunchtime to evening

examples.en: Let's meet in the afternoon.

meanings.english: once more; another time

examples.en: Can you say that again, please?
examples.ko: 다시 한 번 말해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: in opposition to; contrary to

examples.en: He leaned against the wall.

meanings.english: the length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed

examples.en: She is the same age as me.

meanings.english: before the present time

examples.en: I saw him a week ago.

meanings.english: to have the same opinion as someone else

examples.en: I agree with your idea.

meanings.english: in or toward the front

examples.en: Keep walking ahead until you see the park.
examples.ko: 공원을 볼 때까지 계속 앞으로 걸어가.

meanings.english: the mixture of gases that surrounds the Earth and that we breathe

examples.en: The air in the mountains is fresh and clean.

meanings.english: a vehicle with wings that flies in the air

examples.en: We took an airplane to travel to another country.
examples.ko: 다른 나라로 여행하기 위해 비행기를 탔다.

meanings.english: a collection of songs or photographs

examples.en: I bought a new album of my favorite band.
examples.ko: 내가 좋아하는 밴드의 새 앨범을 샀다.

meanings.english: the whole quantity or extent of

examples.en: All students must wear uniforms.

meanings.english: nearly all

examples.en: I almost missed the bus.

meanings.english: by oneself

examples.en: She prefers to work alone.

meanings.english: in a line next to something long

examples.en: We walked along the river.

meanings.english: before or by now or the time in question

examples.en: I have already finished my homework.

meanings.english: Satisfactory; acceptable

examples.en: It's alright to make mistakes as long as you learn from them.

meanings.english: In addition; too

examples.en: I would like some coffee, and also a piece of cake.

meanings.english: At all times; on every occasion

examples.en: She always arrives early for class.

meanings.english: Used to connect words or phrases

examples.en: I like to read books and watch movies.
examples.ko: 책을 읽고 영화를 보는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: A living organism that feeds on organic matter

examples.en: The zoo has a variety of animal species.
examples.ko: 그 동물원에는 다양한 동물 종들이 있어.

meanings.english: One more; an additional

examples.en: I'll have another piece of cake, please.
examples.ko: 제게 또 다른 조각 케이크를 주세요.

meanings.english: To respond to a question or statement

examples.en: Can you answer this question for me?
examples.ko: 이 질문에 대답해 줄 수 있나요?

meanings.english: Used to refer to one or some of a thing or number of things, no matter how much or how many

examples.en: Do you have any questions?

meanings.english: A set of rooms for living in, usually on one floor of a building

examples.en: She lives in a small apartment in the city.
examples.ko: 그녀는 도시의 작은 아파트에 살고 있습니다.

meanings.english: A round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish interior

examples.en: I like to eat an apple every day.
examples.ko: 저는 매일 사과를 먹는 것을 좋아합니다.

meanings.english: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world

examples.en: This park covers a large area.

meanings.english: The part of the body between the shoulder and the hand

examples.en: She broke her arm while playing soccer.

meanings.english: In a circle or a curve; surrounding

examples.en: The children ran around the playground.

meanings.english: To reach a place, especially at the end of a journey

examples.en: The train will arrive at 3 p.m.

meanings.english: The expression or application of human creative skill and imagination

examples.en: She enjoys creating art with watercolors.
examples.ko: 그녀는 수채화로 예술 작품을 만드는 것을 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: to the same degree

examples.en: She is as tall as her brother.

meanings.english: to inquire or request

examples.en: I will ask the teacher for help.

meanings.english: in or near a particular place

examples.en: I am waiting at the bus stop.

meanings.english: the sister of one's parent

examples.en: My aunt lives in a different city.
examples.ko: 내 고모는 다른 도시에 살고 계십니다.

meanings.english: the season between summer and winter

examples.en: The leaves change color in autumn.

meanings.english: at a distance from a particular place, person, or thing

examples.en: She ran away from the dog.

meanings.english: a very young child, especially one that has not yet begun to walk or talk

examples.en: The baby is sleeping peacefully.

meanings.english: the rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips

examples.en: He carried the heavy box on his back.

meanings.english: of poor quality or a low standard; not satisfactory or acceptable

examples.en: Eating too much candy is bad for your health.
examples.ko: 과자를 너무 많이 먹는 것은 건강에 좋지 않다.

meanings.english: a game played on a rectangular court by two or four players who hit a shuttlecock over a net with a light, long-handled racket

examples.en: Let's play badminton in the park this weekend.

meanings.english: A container made of flexible material with an opening at the top, used for carrying things

examples.en: She put her books in the bag.

meanings.english: To cook food in an oven without direct exposure to a flame

examples.en: She likes to bake cookies on the weekends.
examples.ko: 그녀는 주말에 쿠키를 굽는 것을 좋아한다.

meanings.english: A round object that is used in sports and games

examples.en: He kicked the ball into the goal.

meanings.english: A long curved fruit with a yellow skin and soft, sweet flesh

examples.en: She ate a banana for breakfast.

meanings.english: A financial institution that provides various financial services, such as accepting deposits and lending money

examples.en: He went to the bank to deposit his paycheck.
examples.ko: 그는 월급을 입금하기 위해 은행에 갔다.

meanings.english: The bottom or lowest part of something

examples.en: She built her argument on the base of solid evidence.
examples.ko: 그녀는 확고한 증거의 기초 위에 주장을 구축했다.

meanings.english: A game played with a bat and ball by two teams of nine players each

examples.en: He enjoys playing baseball with his friends on weekends.
examples.ko: 그는 주말에 친구들과 야구를 즐기는 것을 즐긴다.

meanings.english: A container made of woven material used for carrying or storing items

examples.en: She picked apples and put them in the basket.

meanings.english: A team sport played on a rectangular court with a raised basket at each end

examples.en: He practices basketball every day to improve his skills.
examples.ko: 그는 매일 농구를 연습하여 실력을 향상시킨다.

meanings.english: A club-shaped implement used in sports such as baseball and cricket

examples.en: He swung the bat and hit the ball out of the park.
examples.ko: 그는 방망이를 휘두르고 공을 공원 밖으로 쳤다.

meanings.english: a washing of the body, typically in a bathtub or shower

examples.en: I take a bath every evening.

meanings.english: to exist or live

examples.en: I am a student.

meanings.english: a pebbly or sandy shore, especially by the ocean between high- and low-water marks

examples.en: Let's go to the beach this weekend.

meanings.english: a large, heavy mammal with thick fur and a very short tail

examples.en: I saw a bear in the forest.

meanings.english: a combination of qualities, such as shape, color, or form, that pleases the aesthetic senses

examples.en: The sunset was a true beauty.

meanings.english: Used to introduce an explanation or reason.

examples.en: I stayed home because I was sick.

meanings.english: Begin to be.

examples.en: She wants to become a doctor when she grows up.

meanings.english: A piece of furniture for sleep or rest.

examples.en: I love my bed because it's so comfortable.
examples.ko: 내 침대를 좋아하는 이유는 너무 편해서야.

meanings.english: An insect that collects nectar from flowers.

examples.en: The bee is busy collecting pollen from the flowers.
examples.ko: 그 벌은 꽃에서 꿀을 모으느라 바쁘다.

meanings.english: Meat from a cow.

examples.en: I prefer chicken over beef.

meanings.english: at an earlier time

examples.en: Please arrive before 9 AM.

meanings.english: to start

examples.en: Let's begin the meeting now.

meanings.english: at the back of something

examples.en: The cat is behind the sofa.

meanings.english: to accept that something is true

examples.en: I believe in you.

meanings.english: a hollow metal object that makes a ringing sound when struck

examples.en: The bell rang for the end of class.

meanings.english: in a lower place

examples.en: The book is below the desk.

meanings.english: a strip of leather or other material worn around the waist

examples.en: She wore a black belt with her dress.
examples.ko: 그녀는 드레스에 검은색 벨트를 차고 있었습니다.

meanings.english: at the side of; next to

examples.en: The cat sat beside the dog.

meanings.english: in or into the space that separates two places, people, or objects

examples.en: The park is between the library and the school.

meanings.english: large in size or amount

examples.en: She has a big house.

meanings.english: A two-wheeled vehicle that is powered by pedaling

examples.en: I ride my bike to school every day.

meanings.english: A statement of money owed for goods or services

examples.en: The waiter brought the bill after we finished our meal.
examples.ko: 우리가 식사를 마치고 나서 웨이터가 계산서를 가져왔다.

meanings.english: A warm-blooded vertebrate animal with feathers and wings

examples.en: I saw a beautiful bird perched on the tree.
examples.ko: 나무에 앉아 있는 아름다운 새를 봤어.

meanings.english: The act or process of being born

examples.en: Her baby's birth was a joyous occasion for the family.
examples.ko: 그녀 아기의 출생은 가족에게 기쁜 일이었다.

meanings.english: A small, flat, baked cake that is usually sweet

examples.en: I like to have a cup of tea with biscuits in the afternoon.
examples.ko: 나는 오후에 차 한 잔에 비스킷을 함께 먹는 것을 좋아해.

meanings.english: of the darkest color, like coal or the night sky

examples.en: The cat has shiny black fur.
examples.ko: 고양이는 빛나는 검은 털을 가지고 있습니다.

meanings.english: the red liquid that flows through the bodies of humans and animals

examples.en: She cut her finger and blood started to flow.
examples.ko: 그녀는 손가락을 베었고 피가 흘러나기 시작했습니다.

meanings.english: the color of the sky on a clear day

examples.en: The ocean looked beautiful with its deep blue color.

meanings.english: a long, flat piece of wood or other hard material used for a particular purpose

examples.en: She wrote her name on the board with chalk.
examples.ko: 그녀는 분필로 칠판에 자신의 이름을 썼습니다.

meanings.english: a small vessel for travel on water

examples.en: We went fishing on a boat last weekend.
examples.ko: 지난 주말에 우리는 배로 낚시를 하러 갔습니다.

meanings.english: The physical structure of a person or an animal

examples.en: She has a healthy body.

meanings.english: The hard tissue forming the skeleton of vertebrates

examples.en: Dogs love to chew on bones.

meanings.english: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers

examples.en: I enjoy reading books in my free time.
examples.ko: 나는 여가 시간에 책을 읽는 것을 즐깁니다.

meanings.english: To take and use something that belongs to someone else with the intention of returning it

examples.en: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?
examples.ko: 잠시 당신의 펜을 빌릴 수 있을까요?

meanings.english: Used to refer to two people or things, considered together

examples.en: Both of them are talented musicians.
examples.ko: 그 둘 다가 재능 있는 음악가입니다.

meanings.english: A container typically made of glass or plastic, used for storing liquids.

examples.en: She filled the bottle with water.

meanings.english: The lowest point or part of something.

examples.en: The treasure was hidden at the bottom of the sea.
examples.ko: 보물은 바닷속 깊은 곳에 숨겨져 있었다.

meanings.english: A container with a flat base and sides, typically square or rectangular.

examples.en: He put the gift in a box and wrapped it with a ribbon.
examples.ko: 그는 선물을 상자에 넣고 리본으로 감았다.

meanings.english: A male child or young man.

examples.en: The boy played soccer with his friends in the park.
examples.ko: 소년은 친구들과 함께 공원에서 축구를 했다.

meanings.english: Ready to face and endure danger or pain; showing courage.

examples.en: She was brave enough to stand up to the bully.
examples.ko: 그녀는 괴롭힘을 주는 사람에 맞서기 충분히 용감했다.
